timeline.message: Seems to make swagger kongchen more deterministic

github api seems to rely on newer jackson

* newer jackson brings in newer swagger/openapi

timeline.bodyText: Wonder if we should just extend something that has these two rules
timeline.author: garyluu

replies.bodyText:
Could be worth a try, might not necessarily work though.
It looks like @Rule  doesn't declare annotation inheritance, but junit might have implemented it another way
replies.author: denis-yuen
